arts.ttl: Girona piles on misery for lowly Valladolid with easy victory
arts.sum: The result lifted Girona two places to eighth while Valladolid stayed second from bottom with just three wins in 18 games. Girona beat Valladolid 3-0 and snapped an unhappy run of six games without a win in La Liga on Friday.

arts.ttl: Spanish LaLiga injury and suspension news, predicted lineups, fantasy updates
arts.sum: Find out who is missing through injury and who is in a race against time to prove their fitness in Spain's LaLiga this weekend.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid youngster to join Girona during winter transfer window
arts.sum: Real Madrid have a knack for moving on their younger players, with the likes of Rafa Marin and Alex Jimenez having left the club on a permanent basis during the 2024 summer transfer window. The next player that could follow them is Erik Vazquez, albeit his impending departure will only be on loan initially.
